title: How I persist live data in Next.js without waiting for async requests.
summary: While working on one of my projects, I came across a problem with fetching dynamic data from my API. The problem was that I didn't want to do the request on every render, just when I wanted it to be fetched.

structuredData.headline: How I persist live data in Next.js without waiting for async requests.
structuredData.description: While working on one of my projects, I came across a problem with fetching dynamic data from my API. The problem was that I didn't want to do the request on every render, just when I wanted it to be fetched.
